metadata.Title: CVE-2017-2807 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the tag parsing functionality of Ledger-CLI 3.1.1. A specially crafted journal file can cause an integer underflow resulting in code execution. An attacker can construct a malicious journal file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: ledger package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2+dfsg1-1').
